products.name: DeLonghi 15 Bar Espresso and Cappuccino Machine
products.description: Entry-level pump espresso machine with 15-bar pressure and stainless steel boiler. Features manual steam wand for frothing and dual-filter holder for grounds or ESE pods.

products.name: Breville Barista Express Espresso Machine
products.description: Semi-automatic espresso machine with integrated conical burr grinder, 16 grind settings, 15-bar Italian pump, PID temperature control, and 360-degree swivel steam wand.

products.name: Mr. Coffee Espresso and Cappuccino Machine with Automatic Milk Frother and 15-Bar Pump
products.description: Semi-automatic espresso maker with 15-bar pump and automatic milk frother. One-touch controls for single or double shots. Makes espressos, cappuccinos, and lattes.

products.name: De'Longhi 15 Bar Espresso Machine with Advanced Cappuccino System
products.description: 15-bar pump espresso machine with advanced cappuccino system and swivel jet frother. Three-in-one filter for single, double shots, or ESE pods. Compact design.

products.name: Nespresso Essenza Mini Espresso Machine by De'Longhi with Milk Frother
products.description: Ultra-compact capsule espresso machine with 19-bar pump pressure. Features 30-second heat-up, two programmable cup sizes, and included Aeroccino milk frother.

products.name: Nespresso Inissia Original Espresso Machine Bundle with Aeroccino Milk Frother (by De'Longhi)
products.description: Compact capsule espresso maker with 19-bar pressure and 25-second heat-up. Includes Aeroccino frother for hot or cold milk foam.

products.name: Nespresso Vertuo Next Coffee and Espresso Machine with Aeroccino Frother by Breville
products.description: Centrifusion technology spins capsules at 7,000 RPM. Brews six cup sizes from espresso to 18oz. Wi-Fi and Bluetooth connectivity. Includes Aeroccino milk frother.

products.name: Calphalon Temp iQ Espresso Machine with Steam Wand
products.description: 15-bar Italian pump with thermoblock heating, PID temperature control, pre-infusion, 58mm portafilter, steam wand, and 2L removable reservoir.

products.name: Breville Infuser Espresso Machine
products.description: Pre-infusion technology with low-pressure extraction start. PID temperature control adjustable between 196-204°F. 15-bar Italian pump. Steam wand for milk texturing. 61oz removable tank.

products.name: EspressoWorks All In One Barista Bundle Set, 7 Piece Espresso Machine, Cappuccino Maker, Professional Coffee And Latte Machine With Milk Frother and Small Espresso Grinder
products.description: 7-piece bundle with 15-bar pump espresso machine, built-in steam wand, electric grinder, frothing pitcher, two cups, and tamper. 1350W with 45-second heat-up.

products.name: STARESSO Portable Espresso Maker
products.description: Manual portable espresso maker with 15-20 bar pressure. Compatible with ground coffee and Nespresso capsules. 80ml tank, stainless steel construction, no batteries required.

products.name: De'Longhi Stilosa Manual Espresso Machine, Latte & Cappuccino Maker & Milk Frothing Pitcher, Barista Tool, Frother Jug for Espresso Machine Coffee Cappuccino
products.description: Compact manual espresso maker with 15-bar pump pressure, stainless steel boiler, manual steam wand for milk frothing, dual-filter portafilter, and included tamper.

products.name: PHILIPS Fully Automatic Espresso Machine - LatteGo Milk Frother
products.description: Fully automatic with LatteGo milk frother, ceramic grinder, five drink options, intuitive touch display, AquaClean filter, and quick-clean two-part milk system.

products.name: WACACO Minipresso GR, Portable Espresso Machine Handheld Coffee Maker
products.description: Handheld manual espresso maker with semi-automatic piston generating 8-bar pressure. Compact 360g design uses ground coffee. No electricity or cartridges required.

products.name: Capresso Espresso and Cappuccino Machine
products.description: 4-cup steam-driven espresso maker with 800W boiler, swivel milk frother, adjustable steam output, glass carafe, and safety boiler cap.

products.name: Mr. Coffee One-Touch CoffeeHouse + Espresso, Cappuccino, and Latte Maker
products.description: One-touch espresso machine with 19-bar Italian pump, automatic milk frother, 18oz removable milk reservoir, and ESE pod compatibility for lattes and cappuccinos.

products.name: Nespresso CitiZ Original Espresso Machine (by De'Longhi)
products.description: Compact single-serve capsule machine with 19-bar pump pressure, 25-second heat-up, programmable espresso and lungo buttons, folding drip tray, and auto-shutoff.

products.name: Gaggia Brera Super-Automatic Espresso Machine
products.description: Compact super-automatic with ceramic burr grinder, 15-bar pump, Pannarello steam wand, bypass doser for pre-ground coffee, and removable brew group for easy cleaning.

products.name: Mixpresso Espresso Machine for Nespresso Compatible Capsule, Single Serve Coffee Maker
products.description: Nespresso OriginalLine compatible single-serve espresso maker with 19-bar Italian pump, programmable espresso and lungo buttons, 27oz water tank, and automatic shut-off.

products.name: Philips Series Fully Automatic Espresso Machine - LatteGo Milk Frother & Iced Coffee
products.description: Fully automatic super-automatic machine with LatteGo milk frother, ceramic grinder, iced coffee function, five drink options, intuitive touch display, and AquaClean filter system.

products.name: Breville Barista Touch Espresso Machine
products.description: Touchscreen espresso machine with integrated conical burr grinder, automatic milk texturing wand, ThermoJet 3-second heat-up, and 54mm portafilter for barista-quality drinks.

products.name: Chefman 6-in-1 Espresso Machine with Built-In Milk Frother
products.description: 6-in-1 espresso maker with 15-bar pump, built-in milk frother, digital touchscreen, one-touch single or double shot, 1.8L reservoir, self-cleaning function.

products.name: Nespresso VertuoPlus Espresso Machine (by Breville)
products.description: Single-serve Centrifusion system spinning capsules at 7,000 RPM for optimal extraction. Four cup sizes from espresso to coffee. Motorized head, 40oz repositionable tank, 15-second heat-up.

products.name: WACACO Nanopresso Portable Espresso Maker Small Travel Coffee Maker
products.description: Compact hand-operated espresso maker generating 18 bars of pressure. Weighs under one pound. Uses 8g of ground coffee and 80ml of hot water per shot.

products.name: WACACO Minipresso NS, Portable Espresso Machine, Handheld Coffee Maker
products.description: Hand-operated portable espresso maker compatible with Nespresso Original capsules. Generates 8 bars of pressure through manual piston pumping. Requires no batteries or electricity.

products.name: Flair Espresso Maker Classic with Portable Carrying Case
products.description: Fully manual lever press requiring no electricity. Detachable brewing head for easy cleaning. Includes pressure gauge for monitoring extraction, stainless steel tamper, and portable carrying case.

products.name: EspressoWorks Espresso Machine, Latte & Cappuccino Maker- 10 pc All-In-One Espresso Maker with Milk Steamer
products.description: 10-piece bundle with 19-bar pump, built-in milk steamer, bean grinder, thermoblock heating ready in 45 seconds, and single/double shot filter baskets.

products.name: Gaggia Classic Evo Pro
products.description: Semi-automatic espresso machine with 58mm commercial portafilter, 9-bar extraction pressure, 3-way solenoid valve, professional steam wand for microfoam, and 1425W boiler.
